scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run develop" "cd chat-webserver && npm run start"
scripts.debug: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run debug" "cd backend && npm run develop" "cd chat-webserver && npm run start"
scripts.tmux:dev: concurrently "tmux new-session -d -s frontend 'cd frontend && npm run dev'" "tmux new-session -d -s strapi 'cd backend && npm run develop'" "tmux new-session -d -s chat-webserver 'cd chat-webserver && npm start'"
scripts.tmux:debug: concurrently "tmux new-session -d -s frontend 'cd frontend && npm run debug'" "tmux new-session -d -s strapi 'cd backend && npm run develop'" "tmux new-session -d -s chat-webserver 'cd chat-webserver && npm start'"
